II You are my wedded wife, and in consideration of the great love and affection I have for you, and in return for that love, and with the good intention of providing you with some stable income in your future without any deficiency in your livelihood, I hereby grant to you the following immovable property as per the Schedule in paragraph III below, which has been inherited by me, and which I have had the full and complete right of possession of up to the present date, I hereby give you, free of charge and without consideration, a real estate worth Rs. 1,62,000/- in writing, with full rights and title, and you shall take possession of the said property immediately. Further, from now on, the said property shall be registered in your name in the records of the Sri Government and Sri Gram Panchayat and you shall pay all taxes, etc., and shall enjoy the happiness and freedom of your son, grandson and family with full rights of loan, donation, sale and inheritance. There shall be no mortgage or other encumbrances on this property. Having assured you that neither I, nor my heirs, nor my subjects, nor you, nor your heirs, nor your subjects, shall ever have any disputes, disputes, or court cases in respect of these matters, I hereby give my consent to this settlement deed and hand over the property to you forthwith.
N NaiduSheet Endorsement

III Settlement Property Details: In Vizianagaram District, Shringavarapukotta Sari� The dimensions of the vacant land, which is situated in the direction of the village, and is included in the survey no. 450, and which is applicable to the residential area, are as follows:
East to West: 18 feet 5.45 meters
North to South: 37 feet 11.21 meters.
Area: 74 sq. m. 62.16 sq. m. The boundaries of the vacant land are:
1. East: Sheikh Madana Gari's terrace house.
2. South: Panchayat CC Road.
3. West: Others Taluk stone foundations.
4. North: Panchayat CC Road.
I hereby give you the immovable property within the above boundaries free of charge and grant you immediate possession.
Declaration
I have examined the details of the property, and I hereby declare that the property transferred by this deed is transferred under Section 22-b (Central Act 16 Of 1908) Vide Andhra Pradesh Ordinance
No.7 Of 2016 Dated 03.12.2016, and that no one else has any right over the property transferred by me, that is, the property which has come into my possession by inheritance, that I have not sold or transacted any property with anyone, and that I have not made any other changes, and that the registered deed has not been cancelled by any court order, and that if any such facts are found to have been concealed in this deed, I shall be liable to legal action. I am the person who is responsible for paying the appropriate fee for the prosecution. As per AP ACT 9/77, this property is not an assigned property, it is not the property of the Government, there are no plantations like coconut sapota betel nut, granite quarries, other power plants, other structures on this land, this land does not belong to the tribal area of the Waco Board or to the lands of the State and Endowment, we hereby agree to be tried in court under sections 27 and 64 of the Indian Stamp Act. requiredDocuments.docNumber: Gift Settlement Deed executed by Nowdasari Naidu in favour of his Wife, Nowdasari Jaya Vide Doc. No. 5080 of 2024
Tax Receipt in name of Nowdasari Jaya issued by Srungavarapukota Gram Panchayath, towards Assessment number 9432, Vide Receipt NO. 40

sections.content: As per Registered Documents : 1. The property measuring about 74 Sq. Yds., Comprised in Survey No. 450, situated in Srungavarapukota Village, was originally owned by Nowdasari Naidu, Who acquired the property through Inheritance. [REF:Deed] 2. The aforementioned Nowdasari Naidu executed a Gift Settlement Deed on 22/Oct/2024 registered as document No. 5080 of 20224 before the SRO S.Kota(210) in favour of his Wife, Nowdasari Jaya towards the property measuring 74 Sq. Yds., Comprised in Survey No. 450, at Srungavarapukota Village. Schedule property is part of Gramakantam as per recitals of the deed. 3. The aforementioned Nowdasari Jaya executed a Mortgage Deed on 11/Nov/2024 registered as document No. 5267 of 2024 before the SRO S. Kota(210) in favour of Ms Five Star Business Finance Limited towards the property measuring 74 Sq. Yds., situated in Srungavarapukota. Note: It is informed by F.I. that this is a 'BT case', hence, F.I. is to obtain a Receipt Deed before the disbursement of the loan. (B) Additional Documents Supporting the Title : 1. The Property Tax Receipt No.40, imprinted by the Srungavarapukota Grama Panchayathi, discloses that Nowdasari Jaya has paid property tax for tyhe period from 2018 to 2019 towards Assessment number 9432.

contentList: Whether lawyer has verified all original title deeds and documents in respect to the property. * No
Particulars of all registered title deeds offered as security appears in the records of concerned Sub-Registrar of Assurance. * Yes
Whether any charge, encumbrances, defect or adverse entry are found which affect the title of the present owners. * No
Whether online/computer records are available or not and any verification or cross checking are made and the comments/ findings in this regard. * Yes
The period covered under the Encumbrance Certificate (EC) and the encumbrances if any, reflected therein. * 43 Years

Whether any subsisting charge on the property/ies offered as security is found in the search of CERSAI or ROC? If yes, state details of charge and whether the charge has been discharged or not. * Unable to determine from given documents

Whether there any subsisting charge on the property/ies offered as security? If yes, state whether such charge has been discharged or not. (Mortgage/ Lis-pendens/ Charge/ Encumbrances/ Attachment/ others) * No, as verified from EC
In case of missing/absence of any original title deeds of the property what precaution to be taken by the Incred Financial Services Limited in this regard. * NA

Whether the Incred Financial Services Limited will be able to enforce SARFAESI Act, if required against the property offered as security. * Yes, subject to the provisions of the Act, Physical verification of the property, and the quantum of the loan.
Whether the local laws or any other law restricts the creation of the Mortgage/ Sale of the property to be mortgaged to the Incred Financial Services Limited. * No
Type of Mortgage recommended for the Property (Equitable Mortgage/ Registered Mortgage) * As applicable

Applicable Stamp duty payable for mortgage at the respective state where the property is located - For Simple (Registered) Mortgage. For Deposit of Title Deed i.e. Equitable Mortgage/Memorandum of Deposit of Title Deed (EM/MOE/MODTD). Act and Article Number. Registration Charges for Equitable Mortgage/ Registered Mortgage in the respective state * Out of the scope
Whether Equitable Mortgage is compulsorily required to be registered or same is to be intimated to concerned Registrar or Sub-Registrar of Assurance or any other authority. * As applicable
Additional suggestions, if any to safeguard the interest of Incred Financial Services Limited/ ensuring the perfection of security. * No
Description * Details

In case of Take Over/Balance Transfer from any other Banks/Financial Institutions the List of Documents (LOD) is provided for the above documents * Yes/ BT case, Active Mortgage with Ms Five Star Business Finance Limited vide Doc No. 5267 of 2024
Whether title deed of present owner is properly stamped and registered as required under the law? Please provide the details of title deed. * Yes/ Gift Settlement Deed
Whether the property/ies has/have been mutated in the name/s of the present owner? Please mention the name of document by which it is ascertain and If not mutated/recorded what remedy? * No
Whether there is any discrepancy in the mutation details and title deed? Please provide(if yes) * No

Whether requisites Sanctions/ Permissions/ Noc’s/ Plans/ Lay-outs from Competent Authorities under the State/ Central/ Local Laws have been obtained in order to develop/ construction of the property by the Owner/ Developer? Please mention details and If not obtained what remedy? * Unable to determine from given documents

Certificate of Commencement/ Occupation/ Completion/ Possession Receipt have been obtained from competent authorities. Please mentioned details. Whether RERA registration is obtained for the property and details are verified/matched with online portal of RERA. Please mention RERA details (If applicable) * Unable to determine from given documents

Whether permission for conversion of land/plot from Agricultural to Non-Agriculture for Residential/Commercial purpose or other purpose is obtained? Please mention the reference of the same. * Unable to determine from given documents
Whether up to date Property Tax/ Land Revenue Cess is paid to Municipal Corporation/ Panchayat/ Society and other State/Central Govt. Authorities. * Unable to determine from given documents

Whether the property tax receipts have been physically verified and found to be in the name of present owner. If not mutated in the present owner name what remedy? * Scanned Copy is verified and the property is mutated in the name of current owner

Whether any of the minor is having interest in the Property offered as mortgage. If so, whether court permission has been obtained for offering the property as security or is yet to be obtained. If not, whether mortgage can be created on the property/ies offered as security. * No
Any Government Claims, Acquisitions, Third Party Claims, Liens etc. and details thereof. * No

Whether the property is involved in or subject matter of any litigation which is pending or concluded? If so, whether such litigation would adversely affect the creation of a valid mortgage or have any implication of its future enforcement? * No, as per given documents

Whether the property is affected by any Local Laws, ULC Law, Tenancy Law, Development Plan, State/Central Laws or other regulations. Whether subject property is falls under prohibitory list/ negative list in the records of the Local/State/Central Govt. or not. If Yes, please share details of the same and what precaution to be taken by the Incred Financial Services Limited in this regard. * No, as per given documents
Whether Permission or NOC from Developer/ Co-operative Housing Society/ State/ Central/ Local Authority or any other person or entity etc. are required before creation of mortgage. * No
Whether Lease Deed has been stamped and registered as required under the law. Please provide details. * NA
Residual period of Lease. * NA
Whether Lessee is permitted to mortgage the Leasehold Right?  * NA
Whether the consent/permission from the Lessor is required for creating the mortgage or not? * NA
Whether premium, lease rent and other dues have been paid to the Lessor by the Lessee up to date or not? Please mention details thereof. * NA
Any other detrimental clause in the lease-deed? * No
Whether the property belongs to any trust or is subject to the rights of any trust? * No
Whether the trust is a private or public trust? * NA

Whether trust deed specifically authorizes the mortgage of the property and trust is having borrowing power to borrower a loan from bank or financial institution for the purpose of trust under trust deed. Please specify the details. * NA
If Yes, additional precautions/permissions to be obtained for creation of valid mortgage? * NA
Any other precautions to be taken before creation of mortgage * No
Whether searches had been conducted at the concerned office at the Sub-Registrar of Assurance for the past 13 years. Please annex the search receipts and search report in respect thereof. * No

sections.content: In view of the aforesaid documents and information furnished before me/us, I/We hereby certify/opinion that Nowdasari Jaya is/are the absolute owners of the aforesaid schedule property and have an absolute and clear title over the schedule property and mortgage if created will be perfect and available to the Incred Financial Services Limited towards the liabilities of the Borrower.

sections.content: Note: It is to be noted that the online EC has been verified using the key parameters, namely the Document Number, Survey Number/House Number, and Split Survey/House Number of the concerned SRO, as per the Deed. However, cross-verification across multiple SROs has not been carried out due to the AP portal’s requirement of separate passwords for each search parameter, and the OTP-based authentication mechanism makes searches across multiple SROs operationally infeasible. Further, the current owner, Nowdasari Jaya is to be added as a party to the loan structure along with the applicant Nowdasari Naidu.
